wikipedia_page.main: Edward Harold Yeoman "Eddie" Robertson (also known as "Dagger") (19 December 1935 – December 1981) was a Scottish footballer who played for Bury, Wrexham and Tranmere Rovers, before moving to Ellesmere Port as player/coach. He returned to Tranmere as assistant manager and coach under John King until his death, aged 46.
